entry.title: Ambivalent 0.1.0
entry.summary: This is Ambivalent's first release! Ambivalent is a lightweight theme for Pelican, featuring a mobile first responsive design and light/dark themes.
entry.content:
This is Ambivalent's first release! Ambivalent is a lightweight theme for Pelican, with a responsive design and light/dark themes.

I plan to use Pelican and Ambivalent on my own blog and will be adding more features as I have a need for them.

Features

  • Lightweight
  • Responsive design
  • Light and Dark themes
  • SEO best practices
  • Google Analytics
  • Google AdSense
